#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	string a, b,c;
	int T;
	int i, j;
	bool result;

	cin >> T;
	for (i = 0; i < T; i++)
	{
		int tmpa[26] = { 0 };
		int tmpb[26] = { 0 };
		cin >> a >> b;
		result = true;
		
		if (a.length() != b.length())
			result = false;

		for (j = 0; j < a.length() && result; j++)
		{
			tmpa[(int)(a[j] - 'a')]++;
			tmpb[(int)(b[j] - 'a')]++;
		}

		for (j = 0; j < a.length() && result; j++)
		{
			if (tmpa[j] != tmpb[j])
				result = false;
		}
		c=result ? "YES" : "NO";
		cout << c << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
